statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{22 \, x^{3} - 17 \, x^{2} - 25 \, x + 13 , 5 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x , 16 \, x^{3} - 13 \, x^{2} - 15 \, x + 5 , -6 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} + 5 \, x - 1 , 2 \, x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} - 2\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
